data.description:
You would have like to get some foil fencing practice in tonight. Unfortunately, your fencing club is closed tonight...

But you have another option. You could fence with the Brazil Fencing Club, located in the exotic lands of Brazil. What? South America? No... This Brazil is located in the foil fencing capital of the world: Indiana.

Welcome to Brazil Indiana's Fencing Club, We never close. We have fencers practicing at our club 24-hours a day and 365 days a year. Anyone anywhere can fence with this club. No long car trips necessary. This is because our club only exists in virtual reality! Hope you will join us at practice today.

The Brazil Fencing Club has nine hoosier foil fencers ready to challenge you. Test your fencing skill and see if it holds up against these wacky fencers. Use actual real world fencing skills (like beat attacks, disengages, parry ripostes and more) in a virtual reality game that closely simulates actual real world foil fencing.

changelog.change_log:
Added controller haptics for blade contact and menu selections.
Added rotation adjustments to hand offset menu.
BUG FIX: Warmup lesson not working due to player's onguard position too high or too low.
BUG FIX: Opponent's overreaching with disengage.

Added controller haptics for blade contact and menu selections.
Added rotation adjustments to hand offset menu.
BUG FIX: Warmup lesson not working due to player's onguard position too high or too low.
BUG FIX: Opponent's overreaching with disengage.

Updates for Version 1.08.112:

Added two new more complex practice opponents: one left-handed and one right-handed. 

The default pistol grip foil now has a more detailed blade with wire grove, tip tape and proper tip.

Added several new weapons models in the game that can be earned by winning competition bouts:
 *A French grip foil
 *A Italian grip foil
 *A French grip figure eight foil
 *A saber (the modern fencing kind)
 *A French grip epee.
 *A pistol grip epee.   (sorry, despite the epees and saber, still only a foil fencing game)

Once earned, your weapons can be changed by selecting from the wooden weapon stands on the back wall while 
the game is displaying the selection menu at the end of the opponent's side of the strip. 

Adjust controller footwork speed to match your real footwork speed. You will have to advance and retreat the fencing piste while the game times you. 

You can now adjust your weapon/VR controller offset. This has many possible uses:
  *Simply adjust weapon/hand placement to your liking. 
  *Allows you to use a real fencing grip attachment to your controller. (Sorry I don't sell these attachments, you will have to build one yourself)
  *Pommeling a French grip like a epeeist.
   
Setting to allow your weapon blades to glow with priority(right-of-way) when fencing.

Lock out controller rotating/turning setting while fencing for better control.

BUG FIX: When canting your blade, the bend no longer starts behind the guard.
